plugin.name: MLv
plugin.description: Local (Richter) magnitude measured on the vertical component

binding.name: MLv
binding.description: Local (Richter) magnitude measured on the vertical component

group.name: MLv
group.description: Parameters for computing MLv magnitudes from MLv amplitudes.

parameter.name: logA0
parameter.description:
Defines the calibration function log10(A0) for computing MLv. Format: any number of distance-value pairs separated by semicolons Example: "0 -1.3;60 -2.8;100 -3.0;400 -4.5;1000 -5.85" specifies 4 distance intervals from 0...60, 60...100, 100...400 and 400...1000 km distance. Within these intervals log10(A0) is interpolated linearly between -1.3...-2.8, -2.8...-3.0, -3.0...-4.5 and -4.5...-5.8, respectively
Note: The distances of the first and last sample specify the distance range within which MLv shall be computed.

parameter.name: maxDistanceKm
parameter.description: Maximum epicentral distance for computing MLv. No distance limitation for maxDistanceKm=-1
